description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国外交官、朝鲜人民军前军官，金日成之子，金正日的同父异母弟。
description.en: A North Korean diplomat and former military officer, who is the son of Kim Il-sung and the half-brother of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者和第一代最高领导人。
description.en: The founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金日成的第三任妻子，金平一的母亲。
description.en: The third wife of Kim Il-sung and the mother of Kim Pyong-il.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第二代最高领导人，金日成的长子，金平一的同父异母兄。
description.en: The second supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the eldest son of Kim Il-sung, and the half-brother of Kim Pyong-il.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第一所大学。
description.en: The first university established in North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 负责保卫朝鲜最高领导人及其家人、高级官员和国家重要设施的军事单位。
description.en: A military unit responsible for the security of North Korea's supreme leader, his family, high-ranking officials, and important state facilities.

en: General Staff Department of the Korean People's Army

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军的最高军事指挥机关。
description.en: The supreme military command organ of the Korean People's Army.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的第三代最高领导人，金正日之子。
description.en: The third supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, son of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国，一个北美洲的联邦共和国。
description.en: The United States of America, a federal republic in North America.

description.zh-cn: 金平一的儿子。
description.en: Son of Kim Pyong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金平一的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Kim Pyong-il.

nodes.id: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 金平一的同母姐妹。
description.en: Sister of Kim Pyong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金平一的同母姐妹。
description.en: Sister of Kim Pyong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金平一是金日成的儿子。
description.en: Kim Pyong-il is the son of Kim Il-sung.

description.zh-cn: 金平一是金圣爱的儿子。
description.en: Kim Pyong-il is the son of Kim Song-ae.

description.zh-cn: 金仁江是金平一的儿子。
description.en: Kim In-gang is the son of Kim Pyong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金恩松是金平一的女儿。
description.en: Kim Un-song is the daughter of Kim Pyong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金平一是金正日的同父异母弟。
description.en: Kim Pyong-il is the half-brother of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金平一是金万一的同父异母弟。
description.en: Kim Pyong-il is the half-brother of Kim Man-il.

description.zh-cn: 金平一是金庆喜的同父异母弟。
description.en: Kim Pyong-il is the half-brother of Kim Kyong-hui.

description.zh-cn: 金平一是金英一的同母兄弟。
description.en: Kim Pyong-il is the brother of Kim Yong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金平一是金敬淑的同母兄弟。
description.en: Kim Pyong-il is the brother of Kim Kyong-suk.

description.zh-cn: 金平一是金经进的同母兄弟。
description.en: Kim Pyong-il is the brother of Kim Kyong-jin.

description.zh-cn: 1977年于金日成综合大学经济系毕业。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Economics at Kim Il-sung University in 1977.

description.zh-cn: 曾在护卫总局担任装甲车队长。
description.en: Served as an armored vehicle captain in the Guard Command.

position.en: Deputy Director of the Operations Bureau

description.zh-cn: 曾担任朝鲜人民军总参谋部作战局副局长。
description.en: Served as the Deputy Director of the Operations Bureau of the General Staff Department of the Korean People's Army.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类，金平一是朝鲜劳动党党员。
description.en: According to categorization, Kim Pyong-il is a member of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金正日在1974年被确立为接班人后，曾作为继承人候选之一的金平一遭到排挤，并被外派至欧洲各国。
description.en: After Kim Jong-il was established as the successor in 1974, Kim Pyong-il, who had been a candidate for succession, was marginalized and sent to serve in various European countries.

description.zh-cn: 金平一于2019年11月返回朝鲜后，据信受到严密监视，以防止外国势力扶植他来取代金正恩。
description.en: After returning to North Korea in November 2019, Kim Pyong-il is believed to be under close surveillance to prevent foreign powers from propping him up to replace Kim Jong-un.

description.zh-cn: 被视为可能扶植金平一取代金正恩的外部势力。
description.en: Regarded as an external power that might support Kim Pyong-il to replace Kim Jong-un.

description.zh-cn: 据自由亚洲电台2020年4月报导，金正恩曾将军权暂时交给金平日掌管。
description.en: According to a Radio Free Asia report in April 2020, Kim Jong-un temporarily handed over military power to Kim Pyong-il.

description.zh-cn: 曾在护卫司令部担任保卫其父亲金日成的工作。
description.en: Served in the Guard Command, responsible for the protection of his father, Kim Il-sung.
